quote_first: In another sense, on the contrary, our trains, in this latitude, gain over the sun more than 900 kilometres an hour, beating that planet hand over hand: quitting Liverpool at noon, for example, the traveler will reach the station where we now are at
quote_time_case: thirty-four minutes past nine in the morning
quote_last: - that is to say, earlier than he started!
title: An Express of the Future
author: Jules Verne
